#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#include<cstdio>
#define scan(a) scanf("%d",&a)
#define print(a) printf("%d\n",a)
#define FOR(i,a,b) for(i=a;i<b;i++)
int main(){
	int arr[100000],i,n;
		int count=0,flag[100000]={0};
		scan(n);
		FOR(i,0,n)
		scan(arr[i]);
		FOR(i,0,n){
			if(flag[arr[i]]==0)
			flag[arr[i]]++;
			else
			count++;
		}
		print(count);
	return 0;
}
